docs.snippet: The American Power and Light Company, which has been at loggerheads with its former parent, the Electric Bond and Share Company, for some time over the disposition of the Washington Water Power Company, took a rather unusual step yesterday.
docs.lead_paragraph: The American Power and Light Company, which has been at loggerheads with its former parent, the Electric Bond and Share Company, for some time over the disposition of the Washington Water Power Company, took a rather unusual step yesterday.

headline.main: TOPICS AND SIDELIGHTS OF THE DAY IN WALL STREET; An Unusual Position

docs.snippet: Edward F. Cavanagh Jr., Commissioner of Marine and Aviation, will speak at a luncheon of the New York Port unit of the Propeller Club of the United States on Monday at the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel. The luncheon in Mr. Cavanagh's honor also will mark the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Edward F. Cavanagh Jr., Commissioner of Marine and Aviation, will speak at a luncheon of the New York Port unit of the Propeller Club of the United States on Monday at the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel. The luncheon in Mr. Cavanagh's honor also will mark the unit's new fiscal year and anticipates the national club's twentyfifth national convention, which will open here on Oct. 17.
